data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Corner awarded to Angers.
In the minute 1, Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Angers to check on Romain Thomas, who is grimacing with pain.
Throw-in for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 5, Romain Thomas is back on his feet again.
Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Angers.
Lyon are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Angers in their own half.
Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Amaury Delerue signals a Lyon throw-in in Angers's half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Lyon close to the penalty box.
Amaury Delerue awards Angers a goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Lyon!
In the minute 10, Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lyon's half?
In the minute 11, Angers have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Lyon goal kick.
Angers's Sada Thioub is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 13, Throw-in high up the field for Lyon in Angers.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Angers.
Can Angers capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lyon's half?
In the minute 15, In Angers, Lyon push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Angers pushes forward through Angelo Fulgini, whose finish on goal is saved.
Goal kick for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 18, Amaury Delerue signals a throw-in for Angers, close to Lyon's area.
Throw-in Lyon.
Lyon needs to be cautious. Angers have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 21, Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
Tino Kadewere (Lyon) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 24, Angers have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Amaury Delerue awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Angers in their own half.
Angers push forward at Stade Raymond Kopa and Stephane Bahoken gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lyon defence.
Angers have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
In the minute 28, Angers drives forward and Angelo Fulgini gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Angers.
Amaury Delerue signals a throw-in for Lyon, close to Angers's area.
In the minute 30, Throw-in high up the field for Lyon in Angers.
Amaury Delerue awards Angers a goal kick.
Free kick for Lyon in the half of Angers.
In the minute 32, Angers are in shooting range from this free kick.
Rayan Cherki is booked for the away team.
Goal kick for Lyon at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 35, Angers to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
Amaury Delerue awards the away team a throw-in.
Angers have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Angers.
Ball goes out of play for a Lyon goal kick.
Lyon have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 41, Angers are pushing forward but Stephane Bahoken's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Angers.
Thiago Mendes (Lyon) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 43, Angers have a goal kick.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Lyon.
Souleyman Doumbia (Angers) gets a yellow card.
Can Angers capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Angers.
Lyon have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Angers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Angers.
Amaury Delerue awards Angers a goal kick.
Free kick for Angers in their own half.
In the minute 57, Stephane Bahoken of Angers smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Angers a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 59, The away team replace Melvin Michel Maxence Bard with Mattia De Sciglio.
Moussa Dembele is on a sub for Rayan Cherki for Lyon.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Angers close to the penalty box.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Rudi Garcia is making the team's third substitution at Stade Raymond Kopa with Bruno Guimaraes replacing Lucas Paqueta.
Mathias Pereira Lage for Angers has been booked by Amaury Delerue and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 62, Free kick Lyon.
Lyon drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Angers in their own half.
In the minute 63, Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
Moussa Dembele (Lyon) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 68, Lyon needs to be cautious. Angers have an attacking throw-in.
Stephane Moulin (Angers) is making a first substitution, with Farid El Melali replacing Sada Thioub.
Lois Diony is replacing Stephane Bahoken for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 69, Lyon will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Angers.
Mattia De Sciglio (Lyon) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Lyon at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Angers in their own half.
Angers have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
Corner awarded to Angers.
In the minute 74, Angers's Ibrahim Amadou misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Angers.
Goal kick for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Lyon.
Goal! Tino Kadewere gives Lyon a 0-1 lead.
That's a fine assist from Leo Dubois.
In the minute 79, Angers make their third substitution with Antonin Bobichon replacing Mathias Pereira Lage.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Lyon.
The away team have replaced Leo Dubois with Sinaly Diomande. This is the fourth substitution made today by Rudi Garcia.
Angers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 81, Mohamed Ali Cho is replacing Angelo Fulgini for the home team.
Lassana Coulibaly is on a sub for Pierrick Capelle for Angers.
In the minute 82, Lyon to take a throw-in in Angers territory.
Can Lyon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Angers's half?
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a Lyon goal kick.
Thiago Mendes (Lyon) has received a first yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 86, Throw-in Lyon.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 88, Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
Lyon have a goal kick.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Thiago Mendes.
Thiago Mendes for Lyon is back on the field again.
Ball goes out of play for a Lyon goal kick.
At Stade Raymond Kopa the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Amaury Delerue awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Amaury Delerue signals a Lyon throw-in in Angers's half.
Goal kick for Lyon at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lyon's half?
Amaury Delerue signals a throw-in for Angers, close to Lyon's area.
Throw-in Lyon.
The match has come to a close in Angers. The final score is 0-1.
Rudi Garcia (Lyon) is making a fifth change, with Jean Lucas replacing the possibly injured Thiago Mendes.
